Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.odk.collect.android.audio.AudioHelper
    wrapping the ViewModel like this doesn't really fit with other ways we've integrated widgets with "external" services. Instead of this widgets should talk to AudioPlayer and the Activity/Fragment components should talk to the ViewModel itself.
    org.odk.collect.android.logic.FormInfo
    Use the full Form instead.
    org.odk.collect.android.dao.helpers.InstancesDaoHelper
    to favor InstancesRepository
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.odk.collect.android.utilities.Appearances.COMPACT
    org.odk.collect.android.utilities.Appearances.COMPACT_N
    org.odk.collect.android.utilities.Appearances.QUICKCOMPACT
    org.odk.collect.android.utilities.Appearances.SEARCH
    org.odk.collect.android.utilities.Appearances.SELFIE
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.odk.collect.android.widgets.QuestionWidget.addAnswerView(View)
    org.odk.collect.android.widgets.QuestionWidget.addAnswerView(View, Integer)
    org.odk.collect.android.widgets.QuestionWidget.addQuestionLabel(View)
    org.odk.collect.android.utilities.AuthDialogUtility.createDialog(Context, AuthDialogUtility.AuthDialogUtilityResultListener, String)
    should use ServerAuthDialogFragment instead
    org.odk.collect.android.utilities.DialogUtils.getDialog(Class<T>, FragmentManager)
    org.odk.collect.android.preferences.AdminSharedPreferences.getInstance()
    org.odk.collect.android.preferences.GeneralSharedPreferences.getInstance()
    org.odk.collect.android.widgets.QuestionWidget.getInstanceFolder()
    widgets shouldn't need to know about the instance folder. They can use QuestionMediaManager to access media attached to the instance.
    org.odk.collect.android.analytics.FirebaseAnalytics.logEvent(String, String)
    org.odk.collect.android.analytics.Analytics.logEvent(String, String)
    org.odk.collect.android.analytics.FirebaseAnalytics.logEvent(String, String, String)
    org.odk.collect.android.analytics.Analytics.logEvent(String, String, String)
    org.odk.collect.android.instancemanagement.InstanceSubmitter.shouldFormBeSent(FormsRepository, String, String, boolean)
    should be private what requires refactoring the whole class to make it testable
    org.odk.collect.android.forms.FormSource.updateUrl(String)
    This is specific to the Open Rosa/HTTP implementation so should really move down to that level
    org.odk.collect.android.forms.FormSource.updateWebCredentialsUtils(WebCredentialsUtils)
    This is specific to the Open Rosa/HTTP implementation so should really move down to that level
